AI-powered browsers aren’t exactly a novel idea at this point, with both Perplexity and OpenAI releasing their own takes on the concept. Google has also been steadily working on ways to integrate Gemini into web browsing, and this time it has arrived at a new experiment. Enter Disco, the newest offering from Google Labs. Disco […]

The post The Latest Google Labs Experiment Is A Gemini-Powered Browser Called Disco appeared first on Lowyat.NET.
